overview: When French tourist Tim Loux arrives in Marrakech, he finds out the medina, a picturesque neighborhood, which is reminiscent of what the Arab world of the year 1432 was like, with its handcraft and his teeming welcoming crowd. When he sets foot in the riad, it is the complete opposite: a haven of tranquility at the end of a street. Sweet Arab boys are here to welcome him and show him the charm of the Orient. Follow the guide...
title: The Riad
